Prior Codifications

Legislative History of Laws

DC CODE § 2-381.22

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: The CPO may issue a solicitation by any electronic medium, including the Internet, electronic mail, or disk medium.
The CPO may accept responses to solicitations by any electronic medium, including the Internet, electronic mail, or disk medium.
